thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com | 2 of 117
thread.title: Sam Taylor
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Sam Taylor

author: Sam Taylor
title: Sam Taylor
text: Great service overall. Speedy delivery with options to reschedule if not appropriate time/day. Product is of good quality but was initially priced at £170 for a cot bed mattress, I used a bounty.com code to get this reduced to £47.95 which was fantastic but would not have spent £170.
